text: @realDonaldTrump Why don't you concern yourself with the Coronavirus pandemic. Only you are worried about Bernie and Biden. I wonder why. I see your swamp is loaded with the virus, you'd think you might even get yourself checked out palling around with those  creatures. Mr Invincible!
